entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Manicouagan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.7°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 65 %
Dewpoint: -26.5°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
